name: Please repare this game
description:
You arrive in a game where the developper has made multiple games for you. But the games are not ready and...... Well you'll see it ! 

All the code by me

Assets I made :

- The targets in the tanky game

- All the UI

- Particules (the pixel art bullet in the 2 buttons game is not from me

(All the other assets are taken from the asset store)

Animations I made :

- The targets' animation

- The text in the dialogues (Where characters are appearing 1 by 1)

(Pixel art animation are taken from the asset store)
